Label: AM
Formula: A_c * (1 + m * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_m * t + phi_m)) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi_c)

Label: FM
Formula: A_c * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + k_f * np.cumsum(m) + phi_c)

Label: PM
Formula: A_c * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + k_p * m + phi_c)

Label: Chirp
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * (f_0 * t + 0.5 * K * t**2) + phi)

Label: GMSK
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + np.pi * h * np.cumsum(m) + phi)

Label: MSK
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + np.pi * np.cumsum(m) + phi)

Label: QAM
Formula: I(t) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t) - Q(t) * np.sin(2 * np.pi * f_c * t)

Label: BPSK
Formula: A_c * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + np.pi * d(t))

Label: QPSK
Formula: A_c * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + (np.pi / 2) * d(t))

Label: DPSK
Formula: A_c * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi_prev + delta_phi)

Label: FSK
Formula: A_c * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f(t) * t + phi)

Label: OFDM
Formula: np.sum([A_k * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_k * t + phi_k) for k in range(N)])

Label: ASK
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi) if d(t) == 1 else 0

Label: CPM
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + theta(t))

Label: OOK
Formula: A * d(t) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi)

Label: 16QAM
Formula: I(t) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t) - Q(t) * np.sin(2 * np.pi * f_c * t)

Label: 64QAM
Formula: I(t) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t) - Q(t) * np.sin(2 * np.pi * f_c * t)

Label: 128QAM
Formula: I(t) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t) - Q(t) * np.sin(2 * np.pi * f_c * t)

Label: 256QAM
Formula: I(t) * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t) - Q(t) * np.sin(2 * np.pi * f_c * t)

Label: BFSK
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_d * t + phi)

Label: PAM
Formula: np.sum([A_n * p(t - n * T) for n in range(N)])

Label: DPSK-BPSK
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi_prev + delta_phi)

Label: DPSK-QPSK
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi_prev + delta_phi)

Label: Hamming
Formula: Codifica usata in altre modulazioni

Label: Pulse Position Modulation (PWM)
Formula: A * square(2 * np.pi * f_c * t, duty=m(t))

Label: Delta Modulation
Formula: Delta * np.sum([d_n * p(t - n * T) for n in range(N)])

Label: Spectral Amplitude Coding
Formula: np.sum([A_k * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_k * t + phi_k) for k in range(N)])

Label: Code-Division Multiple Access
Formula: np.sum([d_k * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi_k) * c_k(t) for k in range(N)])

Label: Frequency Hopping Spread Spectrum
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_h(t) * t + phi)

Label: Multi-Carrier CDMA
Formula: np.sum([d_k * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_ck * t + phi_k) * c_k(t) for k in range(N)])

Label: Adaptive Modulation and Coding
Formula: A * np.cos(2 * np.pi * f_c * t + phi + (2 * np.pi * d(t) / M))
